item.title: Fiber Internet Availability and Lower Prices
item.description:
By: John Shepler It’s time for businesses to switch from traditional wireline internet to fiber optic service. You might be surprised how accessible and affordable fiber internet has become. Fiber Optic Internet: What’s New? A decade ago, fiber optic internet was only for large corporations due to its high cost. The service, primarily offered by major telephone companies, was limited in availability and very expensive. This has changed drastically. Today, Ethernet has become the most popular fiber optic service, with prices comparable to older T1 or T3 lines while offering significantly more bandwidth...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/fiber-internet-availability-and-lower-prices/
